Process: Google Hangouts resume dive on past experience, take-home project OR architectural phone screen, on-site interviews (2 technical architecture related to work, 1 or 2 non-technical)

Name: Lydia
Process: Mini take-home project, phone interview, discussion on-site

Name: Lyft
Process: Pair programming on-site with your own personal laptop

Name: Lyoness Austria GmbH
Process: Take-Home project, discussion on-site

Name: Made Tech
Process: [Our hiring process](https://github.com/madetech/handbook/tree/master/guides/hiring#20-minute-phone-conversation)

Name: Magnetis
Process: Phone interview + take home assignment, followed by pair programming and informal meeting with the team.

Name: Major League Soccer
Process: Phone interview + short take home project, which is daily work focused. In person interview could involve discussing past projects or pair programming.

Name: MakeTime
Process: Practical exercise and/or a pairing session on site

Name: Mango Solutions
Process: Initial phone interview, followed by on-site interview with take-home assignment

Name: Mapbox
Countries: United States of America (USA),United States of America (USA),Peru,India,Germany
Process: Conversational interviews, paid onsite project with team.

Name: Mavenlink
Countries: United States of America (USA),United States of America (USA),United States of America (USA)
Process: On-site pairing with multiple engineers. Pairing excercises and pairing on company code.

Name: Maxwell Health
Process: Take-home exercise or pairing session with team. Then conversational meetings with members of the team.

Name: Me & Company
Process: You join us for one or two paid trial days to work on an assignment and to meet the team.

Name: Media Pop
Process: Take-home or unsupervised (onsite) real-world assignment

Name: Meetrics
Process: Initial interview, take-home code challenge and review

Name: Meltwater
Process: Small take home exercise that will be presented to the team during a QA style interview

Name: Mention
Process: Take-home small exercise followed up by on site meetings with your future coworkers

Name: Mercatus
Process: Practical on-site project similar to daily work

Name: mfind
Process: Phone call about technical experience, Take-home project or technical test(depends on experience), Onsite interview with technical lead.

Name: miDrive
Process: Phone screen, Take-home project / technical test, Onsite interview with senior and peer.

Name: milch & zucker
Process: Interview with direct feedback, applicants providing working sample, code review (product code or personal code of applications)

Name: Mimir
Process: Take home interview, phone screen, in person interview where you decide how you want to be interviewed (questions, pair programming, etc.)

Name: Minute Media
Process: Phone screening with engineer. On-site real-world challenge questions with two engineers. Sometimes a take-home assignment or existing code sample submission.

Name: Mirumee
Process: Pair programming and code review using one of the issues (or Pull Requests) in our open-source Saleor project, general discussion about programming, technology and candidate's experience

Name: Mixmax
Process: Takehome assignment purely based on their platform, followed by phone interview

Name: MobileCashout
Process: Quick introduction video call with a tech (less than 10-15 minutes). On-site open source contribution to a project of candidates choosing, paired with a tech from the team. Interview and a short questionaire about software design and relevant technologies. Interview and presentation of the company with a HR rep.

Name: Mode
Process: Phone interview followed by onsite pair-architecting and discussion

Name: MokaHR
Process: Take home project/challenge, then on-site programming session taken from problems we encounter at work

Name: Moneytree Front-end Web Team
Process: Pair programming exercise and social gathering with team

Name: Monzo
Process: Phone interview with another engineer. Take-home assignment. Call to debrief on take-home assignment. Half-day interview (on-site or Hangouts) with three conversational sessions: (1) building on take-home test & real-world system design (verbal and collaborative); (2) digging into knowledge & understanding in 1-2 other relevant technical areas; (3) general background, teams and ways of working.

Name: Mutual Mobile
Process: Technical discussion, code test based on actual work you'll be doing, panel style discussions for cross-functional and culture-fit.

Name: Mutual of Omaha
Process: Panel Style Interviews analyzing problem solving, ability to adapt well to change, and interpersonal communication skills.

Name: Mutually Human Software
Countries: United States of America (USA),United States of America (USA)
Process: Collaborative problem analysis and design exercise, pairing exercise

Name: Nanobox
Process: A phone/video/person-to–person interview with a look at past projects (github, bitbucket, source code, etc.)

Name: Native Instruments
Process: Takehome programming assignment and personal interviews with part of the hiring team.

Name: Nearsoft Inc
Process: Takehome [logic test](https://nearsoft.com/blog/the-logic-behind-nearsofts-logic-test/), english interview to check communication skills, short technical interview about experience, long technical discussion about languages/tools/practices you will use on daily basis, pair programming session.

Name: Nedap
Process: A simple conversation, human to human and a small on-site project

Name: Netflix Enterprise Platforms
Process: Takehome exercise, series of real-world interviews with engineers, HR, engineering managers and our director.

Name: Netguru
Process: Takehome exercise & pair programming session

Name: Netlify
Process: Paid takehome project and online/onsite discussion

Name: New Relic
Process: Takehome exercise &/ or pair programming session depending on the team

Name: NewVoiceMedia
Process: Telephone interview, takeaway coding exercise, on-site pair programming, code review & technical discussion (1/2 day)

Name: Nexcess.net
Process: We mostly chat to get a feel on both ends if there's a good cultural fit. We ask questions to see what experience you have and how you think as a programmer. At some point we look at some of your code or have you work on some of ours (1 hour).

Name: Nimbl3
Process: Takehome exercise and specific role discussion

Name: Niteoweb
Process: Join us for a week to see if we fit

Name: Nitro
Process: Phone Call, Take Home Test, Hiring Manager Phone Interview followed by an onsite discussion

Name: Noa
Process: 1 technical chat, 2-3 cultural chats with colleagues from different departments in the team, if these work a pair programming exercise

Name: NodeSource
Process: A person-to–person walk through of a past project of yours

Name: Nomoko
Process: Three interrogations

Name: Nord Software
Process: Take-home exercise & interview with CEO and senior developer

Name: NoRedInk
Process: Take-home exercise & pair programming session

Name: NoviCap
Process: Takehome exercise & discussion on-site

Name: Novoda

Name: Novus Partners

Name: npm, Inc

Process: Phone conversation, take-home exercise, code walkthrough, on-site code pairing.

Name: X-Team
Process: A short, fun Node.js challenge, followed by a series of culture-based interview questions, followed by a creative mock project with tons of freedom on how to approach, and follow-up questions about the approach they chose to discuss the tradeoffs. Usually a 10-30 day paid training is rewarded to top candidates to prep them for remote communication skills needed to join a team.

Name: Yhat

Name: Zenefits (UI Team)
Process: One technical phone screen focused on JS fundamentals and/or one timeboxed take-home challenge. The onsite is a series of interviews designed to test your understanding of JS, HTML/CSS, design, etc.
